As you can see with my play time, this is a game I go back to a lot. I have a love/hate relationship with it so here is my honest opinion. 

The Good: I love the thrill of the game. You are always on your toes and every game is different. The Devs continue to push out DLC and they have some amazing characters to play as. Each person has their own story and cool outfits that you can mix and match to your hearts content. When pair with a great team as a survive its a fun game that makes this game worth your time. I have met most of my friends from this game and I highly recommend it. You can also play as killer, but I usually play as a survivor main, but they have all different types to meet your skill level.

The Bad: Take this with a grain of salt, because your going to have to if you play this game. Every game has its downsides so it will be up to you to choose to play this or not. The connection on games are a bit finicky. You can wait for more than a hour to get into a lobby on a bad day as well as sometimes your computer will disconnect from your server making you repeat the whole process over again. It can get a bit annoying at time. As much as I have made friends with this game, your also going to make enemy's. Its amazing when you find the perfect team, but in all honestly, its more likely your going to be left to die either on first hook (because everyone is for themselves) or be left behind (also because everyone for themselves). After game chats can lead to nasty name calling and reports because your team is salty, because you accidentally blew up a gen, or accidentally sandbagged. Everyone forgets that there are bad games. EVERYONE has them. It can get a bit nasty and with console player now crossed over they feel like they can do whatever they want to others. Kind  of wants to make you rage quit. There have been many a day I just had to stop because of the terrible people. Some disconnect on you (leaving you to die by your self), while others suicide on hook (and also leaving you to die by your self). This game is not for the faint of heart and god forbid your internet goes out and it wasn't even your fault, You get a penalty lock for disconnecting while in game. (2 min+). 

Conclusion: I love this game (met my friends, love playing the game, buying new clothes, seeing what new, and playing in events.), but it has its issues (Horrible connection, teammates, and tunneling/camping killers) I recommend strongly for anyone who can keep face with issues. If your sensitive best go else where.

Oyun harika, atmosfer harika, size o korkuyu sonuna kadar yaşatıyor. Mobil versiyonuda yakında geliyor, daha ne olsun?

Yalnız bu tarz oyunlara yapılan güncellemelerde sadece yeni map ve yeni karakter getirmek yerine, değişik oyun modlarıda gelse fena olmazdı. Mesela bir mapte 8 kurban, 2 katilin olması gibi. Buna benzer birçok mod oyuna eklenebilir.

Took me years later to finally like this game. Compared to years prior, this game is pretty decent, worth it to pick up on sale. However, the amount of killers without DLC isn't that exciting. With that said, it would be wise to get this game when it's on sale so you can buy a killer/survivor you'd actually like to play.

Не тратьте свои деньги на ЭТО! Игра умирает! Много багов, которые не чинятся. Разрабы которые наплевали, как по мне, на игру. Добавляют скины платные, но не чинят баги. Дополнение последнее выпустили сырым. Обещали 3 месяца починить хиты через окна и палетки, в итоге ничего не сделали - только больше багов завезли. Убили геймплей за сурвов, сложно выжить (в основном маны делают -4, даже если ман толком не умеет играть.). На манах сейчас сложность заключается только в генраше, потому-что у них нет другого выбора. Разрабы не хотят чинить и балансировать игру. Только фиксят сурвов. В последнем обновлении убили инструменты для починки. Как по мне игра скоро совсем умрет. И что бы вы не выкидывали деньги на ветер, предестерегаю вас не покупать ее.

played this game a ton in 2018, and couldn't stop. the horror faction of the game is definitely up there. somewhat lost interest throughout 2019 though, as i had no one to play with and was too scared to play with random people as i was frightened of getting judged for something i may have done wrong/differently. if you're willing to buy this product, i recommend budging your friends for it too. the concept is undeniably amazing.

I do enjoy this game but I cannot stress enough turn the chat box off.  Unless you play like you've been playing since day one people will blame you for the loss and tell you to kys, so as much as I enjoy the game the community is absolute trash with people thousands of hours in bullying people with 5 hours for being bad.  I honestly can't recommend this game because of half the people I've encountered in this game, sure you meet some cool people but that's only once every 20 hours, the rest of the people take the game wayyyy too seriously and will yell at you for 20 minutes because you had under 20k bloodpoints.  I can just sum it up to this good game, sorta unbalanced with the newest update and very very toxic community that devs do nothing to fix.  Just thought I'd mention too that their dedicated servers are ass! I just got banned for 5 minutes because their server fucked up so yeah this game could only go downhill.
